definition: A macronutrient essential for the growth, repair, and maintenance of body tissues, commonly found in various foods and often associated with muscle development and overall health.

examples.german: Protein ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil der Ernährung.
examples.english: Protein is an important component of nutrition.

examples.german: Tierische Produkte enthalten oft viel Protein.
examples.english: Animal products often contain a lot of protein.

examples.german: Pflanzliche Proteine sind eine gute Alternative für Vegetarier.
examples.english: Plant-based proteins are a good alternative for vegetarians.
Protein deficiency can lead to muscle weakness.
Athletes require an increased intake of protein.
